name: Analysis Demo
description:
Here I will put demos of games I made. Also please join my Discord! Info about games there! and you might be able to play games that aren't here yet!

The first demo, is ANALYSIS. Now, obviously you have absolutely no idea why it's ANALYSIS, right? Well You won't know for a long time... until the full game is finally released. I don't really know when I will finish it, but be patient! I might tell you more on my Discord!
